name: Real Quest
description:
REAL QUEST (EARLY ACCESS) FOR ANDROID

Real Quest is an early-access Android game on Google Play, made with Godot Engine!

The VALLEY OF THE BITS is just a beautiful place, but... something strange is happening... The king of VALLEY OF THE BITS took a trip to the other side of the world and his brother (not so trustworthy) is doing an experiment a little bit. .. wrong! Are all the people of VALLEY OF THE BITS being turned into... zombies?

HELP KINGDOM OF CUBES!

Only YOU can save VALLEY OF THE BITS! you are the only one capable of solving everything... Find the king!

FACE ALL MONSTERS

They say it's not just people being turned into ZOMBIES, scary... Face all the monsters and save VALLEY OF THE BITS!

SEND THE MONSTERS AWAY!

Thanks to a local (and good) scientist you are able to send the monsters away with a SPECIAL POWER while solving everything...

JUST SWIM

Just swim!

BEYOND VALLEY OF THE BITS...

Lots of PLACES TO EXPLORE until you find the king, are zombies everywhere?

PLACES, CLIME AND... MONSTERS?

Rain and snow, many different CLIMATES around the world and friendly monsters...

PREPARED?

Venture right now and save VALLEY OF THE BITS for FREE!

MUCH MORE TO COME...

Real Quest is a game under construction and based on your feedback it could be AMAZING, I'm counting on you!

Download Real Quest now completely for FREE!

---

Real Quest contains in-app purchases and contains ads.

Visit the Inercode website: https://inercode.web.app

Made by just one person, feel free to support my work with a donation in the game, thanks :).
